Maggie

Hi! I’m Maggie Chen 🍡

I’m currently a rising junior majoring in Information Science with a concentration in Interactive Technology and a minor in Computer Science at Cornell University.

I have a lot of interest in a variety of things, and I’m constantly exploring new interests.

I'm passionate about social impact and developmental psychology. I’m also interested in ML/AI while also dabbling in Front-end Design.

This website will be mainly used for my interests and my portfolio.

I'm currently looking for a 2024 summer internship in Software Development.
